text: The six species in the genus Didelphis, commonly known as large American opossums, are members of the Didelphimorphia order. Species: *Didelphis albiventris *Didelphis aurita *Didelphis imperfecta *Didelphis marsupialis *Didelphis pernigra *Didelphis virginiana ==Related pages== * Marsupial * Opossum == References == * Gardner, Alfred 2005. in Wilson D.E. & Reeder D.M. (eds) Mammal species of the world, 3rd edition, Johns Hopkins University Press, 5. Category:Marsupials
title: Didelphis
